import React,{useContext,useState} from "react"; import noteContext from "../Context/notes/noteContext" import NoteItem from "./NoteItem"; // import noteState from "../Context/notes/noteState"; export default function Notes() { const context = useContext(noteContext) const {notes,addnotes}= context return ( <>

Create a New Note

Your Notes

{Array.isArray(notes) && notes.length > 0 ? ( notes.map((note) => ( )) ) : (

); }
